name: RescueMyLittlePet
description:
Stretch the cute mum cat across obstacles to rescue the cute kittens and help them reach safety. Collect various pet breeds with each successful rescue mission.
An addicting, simple hyper casual puzzle game, especially made for cute pet-lovers. Start playing TODAY!


features:
• Lovable, cute puppies and kittens of all varieties!
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
• Hundreds of puppy and kitten puzzling levels!
